duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage accounts receivable, settlement proposals, appeals, denials, and oversee billing department activities.
Ensure compliance with Medicare and oversee billing, coding, charge entry, cash posting, and accounts receivable follow-up procedures.
Provide excellent customer service and critical thinking, process multiple tasks with accuracy and efficiency, and resolve denials and self-pay collections.
Oversee all aspects of billing and coding, Medicare, In and Out of network policies, and accounts receivable.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Management or related field preferred.
Certified Professional Coder (CPC) or equivalent certification recommended and preferred.
